column1:
* {
      margin: 0;
    }
    html, body {
      height: 100%;
    }
    .page-wrap {
      min-height: 100%;
      /* equal to footer height */
      margin-bottom: -142px; 
    }
    .page-wrap:after {
      content: """";
      display: block;
    }
    .site-footer, .page-wrap:after {
      height: 142px; 
    }
    .site-footer {
      background: orange;
    }
